job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Canvas is one of the core pillars under Michelangelo, Uber's machine learning platform. This team focuses on building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists. We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production.

   Now we are extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models. We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems.

   This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization, orchestrations, dev tool development, and distributed algorithms.

   We also have a great reputation in the industry building leading edge solutions for ML platforms.

   What You'll Do

     * Provide solutions for data curation pipelines.
     * Develop the platform for training / analyzing / serving large scale models, embedding, NLP models.
     * As a core member of Michelangelo, work with team members in US to develop solutions for NLP and generative AI used by all ML engineers in Uber.
job_details.full_text:
Sr Software Engineer (Machine Learning)

Canvas is one of the core pillars under Michelangelo, Uber's machine learning platform. This team focuses on building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists. We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production.

   Now we are extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models. We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems.

   This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization, orchestrations, dev tool development, and distributed algorithms.

   We also have a great reputation in the industry building leading edge solutions for ML platforms.

   What You'll Do

     * Provide solutions for data curation pipelines.
     * Develop the platform for training / analyzing / serving large scale models, embedding, NLP models.
     * As a core member of Michelangelo, work with team members in US to develop solutions for NLP and generative AI used by all ML engineers in Uber.

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses heavily on building and standardizing model development experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists, including feature engineering, training, serving, and ML-Ops. While generative AI is mentioned as an extension, the core emphasis remains on traditional ML model development and productionization within a platform context.

job_tasks.task: Provide solutions for data curation pipelines.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to managing and preparing data, which is a core component of data engineering.

job_tasks.task: Develop the platform for training / analyzing / serving large scale models, embedding, NLP models.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of a platform for core ML activities like training, analysis, and serving of various model types, including embeddings and NLP models.

job_tasks.task: As a core member of Michelangelo, work with team members in US to develop solutions for NLP and generative AI used by all ML engineers in Uber.
job_tasks.justification: This involves developing solutions for specific AI domains (NLP, generative AI) which falls under the modeling category, especially when building them for use by other engineers.

job_tasks.task: We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring.
job_tasks.justification: This describes building and operating a development tool that covers the entire ML lifecycle, including ML-Ops and monitoring, indicating a strong focus on productionizing and maintaining models.

job_tasks.task: With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the operational aspect of scaling ML solutions robustly into production, which is a key part of MLOps.

job_tasks.task: We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems.
job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on 'productionize' and 'large scaling models' points directly to MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.task: This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization, orchestrations, dev tool development, and distributed algorithms.
job_tasks.justification: Batch data processing optimization and orchestrations are key components of data engineering and pipeline management.

job_tasks.task: This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization, orchestrations, dev tool development, and distributed algorithms.
job_tasks.justification: Dev tool development is a software engineering task, even if it's for ML engineers.

soft_skills.skill: work with team members in US
ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs
iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time
build and operate the dev tool
develop solutions for NLP and generative AI
